00039 #include "CmdLightPositionModified.h"
00040 #include "tgf.h"
00041 #include "TLightKit.h"
00042 #include "Trace.h"
00043 
00044 CmdLightPositionModified::CmdLightPositionModified( TLightKit* light, QDateTime time, double longitude, double latitude, QUndoCommand* parent )
00045 :QUndoCommand( "Sun position changed", parent ), lightKit( light ), newTime( time ), newLongitude( longitude ), newLatitude( latitude )
00046 {
00047         Trace trace( "CmdLightPositionModified::CmdLightPositionModified" );
00048         
00049         if( light == 0 ) tgf::SevereError( "CmdLinghtPositionModified called with NULL TLightKit" );
00050         
00051         oldTime = light->GetTime();
00052         oldLongitude = light->longitude.getValue();
00053         oldLatitude = light->latitude.getValue();
00054 }
00055 
00056 CmdLightPositionModified::~CmdLightPositionModified()
00057 {
00058         Trace trace( "CmdLightKitModified::~CmdLightKitModified" );
00059 }
00060 void CmdLightPositionModified::undo()
00061 {
00062         Trace trace( "CmdLightKitModified::undo" );
00063         
00064         lightKit->longitude = oldLongitude;
00065         lightKit->latitude = oldLatitude;
00066         lightKit->ChangePosition( oldTime );
00067 }
00068 
00069 void CmdLightPositionModified::redo()
00070 {
00071         Trace trace( "CmdLightKitModified::redo" );
00072         
00073         lightKit->longitude = newLongitude;
00074         lightKit->latitude = newLatitude;
00075         lightKit->ChangePosition( newTime );
00076 }
